value.text: 求职者常常利用这些授权证书作为证明自己具备某些职位所需要的学术资格或专业技能的证据。
对其间的关系进行了定义
这些定义均由我们在与阿拉巴马州人才三角（Alabama Talent Triad，ATT）项目合作中推动的背景下完成

data.text: The term credential encompasses educational certificates, degrees, certifications, and government-issued licenses. An occupational credential is a verification of an individuals qualification or competence issued by a third party with relevant authority. Job seekers often leverage such credentials as evidence that desired qualifications are satisfied by their holders. Many U.S. education and workforce development organizations have recognized the importance of credentials for employment and the challenges of understanding the value of credentials. In this study, we identified and ontologically defined credential and credential-related terms at the textual and semantic levels based on the Occupation Ontology (OccO), a BFO-based ontology. Different credential types and their authorization logic are modeled. We additionally defined a high-level hierarchy of credential related terms and relations among many terms, which were initiated in concert with the Alabama Talent Triad (ATT) program, which aims to connect learners, earners, employers and education/training providers through credentials and skills. To our knowledge, our research provides for the first time systematic ontological modeling of the important domain of credentials and related contents, supporting enhanced credential data and knowledge integration in the future.
data.translation: 授权证书涵盖了学历证书、学位、资格证书以及由政府机构发放的许可证，是一种证明个人学术资格或专业技能的文件。职业授权证书是由第三方机构颁发的，证明该人员具备相应学术资格或专业技能的文件。求职者常常利用这些授权证书作为证明自己具备某些职位所需要的学术资格或专业技能的证据。美国的教育和劳动力发展组织广泛认识到了授权证书对就业的重要性以及了解其价值的复杂性。本研究基于BFO（抽象形式学）的“职业学术术语学术语”（Occupation Ontology，OccO）模型，对授权证书及其相关术语进行了文本和意义上的定义。同时，还模型了不同类型的授权证书以及授权的逻辑。此外，我们还定义了与授权证书相关的高级概念和词汇，并对其间的关系进行了定义。这些定义均由我们在与阿拉巴马州人才三角（Alabama Talent Triad，ATT）项目合作中推动的背景下完成，该项目旨在通过授权证书与技能连接学习者、获得者、雇主和教育和培训机构。我们认为，本研究为未来的授权证书数据和知识集成提供了有价值的系统性模型，这对于提高相关领域的研究效率至关重要。

data.text: The term credential encompasses educational certificates, degrees, certifications, and government-issued licenses. An occupational credential is a verification of an individuals qualification or competence issued by a third party with relevant authority. Job seekers often leverage such credentials as evidence that desired qualifications are satisfied by their holders. Many U.S. education and workforce development organizations have recognized the importance of credentials for employment and the challenges of understanding the value of credentials. In this study, we identified and ontologically defined credential and credential-related terms at the textual and semantic levels based on the Occupation Ontology (OccO), a BFO-based ontology. Different credential types and their authorization logic are modeled. We additionally defined a high-level hierarchy of credential related terms and relations among many terms, which were initiated in concert with the Alabama Talent Triad (ATT) program, which aims to connect learners, earners, employers and education/training providers through credentials and skills. To our knowledge, our research provides for the first time systematic ontological modeling of the important domain of credentials and related contents, supporting enhanced credential data and knowledge integration in the future.
data.translation: 该术语“证书”包括教育证书、学位、认证和政府发布的许可证。职业资格是由具有相关权威的第三方颁发的对个人资格或能力的验证。求职者经常利用这些证书作为证据，证明其持有者满足所需资格。许多美国教育和劳动力发展组织已认识到证书对就业的重要性以及理解证书价值的挑战。在这项研究中，我们根据职业本体论（OccO）对文本和语义水平上的证书及与证书相关术语进行了标识和本体化定义，这是一个基于BFO的本体论。建模了不同类型的证书及其授权逻辑。此外，我们还定义了与许多术语相关的证书术语的高级关系层次结构，这一概念最初是与“阿拉巴马人才三角”（ATT）计划同时启动的，该计划旨在通过证书和技能连接学习者、收入者、雇主以及教育/培训提供者。据我们所知，我们的研究首次系统化地对证书及相关内容的重要领域进行了本体论建模，这将有助于在未来支持证书数据和知识整合。

Many U.S. education and workforce development organizations have recognized the importance of credentials for employment and the challenges of understanding the value of credentials. In this study, we identified and ontologically defined credential and credential-related terms at the textual and semantic levels based on the Occupation Ontology (OccO), a BFO-based ontology. Different credential types and their authorization logic are modeled. We additionally defined a high-level hierarchy of credential related terms and relations among many terms, which were initiated in concert with the Alabama Talent Triad (ATT) program, which aims to connect learners, earners, employers and education/training providers through credentials and skills. To our knowledge, our research provides for the first time systematic ontological modeling of the important domain of credentials and related contents, supporting enhanced credential data and knowledge integration in the future.
data.translation: 术语“凭证”涵盖了教育证书、学位、认证以及政府颁发的执照。职业凭证是由具有相应权威的第三方对个人的资格或能力进行验证。求职者通常利用这些凭证来证明自己具备所需的资格。许多美国教育与劳动力发展机构已经认识到了凭证对就业的重要性及理解凭证价值的难点。在本研究中，我们基于职业本体（OccO）——一种基于BFO的本体，从文本和语义层面定义并本体化了凭证及相关术语。模型中涵盖了不同类型的凭证及其授权逻辑。我们还设定了一个涉及凭证相关术语和多种术语间关系的高级别层级结构，该结构是与阿拉巴马人才三角计划（ATT）协同启动的，该计划旨在通过凭证和技能将学习者、劳动者、雇主及教育/培训提供者连接起来。据我们所知，这是首次对凭证及其相关内容领域进行系统的本体建模，这将支持未来凭证数据和知识的增强整合。

data.text: We introduce LexBench, a comprehensive evaluation suite enabled to test language models (LMs) on ten semantic phrase processing tasks. Unlike prior studies, it is the first work to propose a framework from the comparative perspective to model the general semantic phrase (i.e., lexical collocation) and three fine-grained semantic phrases, including idiomatic expression, noun compound, and verbal construction. Thanks to ourbenchmark, we assess the performance of 15 LMs across model architectures and parameter scales in classification, extraction, and interpretation tasks. Through the experiments, we first validate the scaling law and find that, as expected, large models excel better than the smaller ones in most tasks. Second, we investigate further through the scaling semantic relation categorization and find that few-shot LMs still lag behind vanilla fine-tuned models in the task. Third, through human evaluation, we find that the performance of strong models is comparable to the human level regarding semantic phrase processing. Our benchmarking findings can serve future research aiming to improve the generic capability of LMs on semantic phrase comprehension. Our source code and data are available at https://github.com/jacklanda/LexBench
data.translation: 我们推出 LexBench，这是一个全面的评估套件，旨在对语言模型（LMs）进行十项语义短语处理任务的测试。与之前的研究不同，这是首个从比较的角度提出的框架，用于建模一般语义短语（即词汇搭配）和包括习语表达、名词复合和动词结构在内的三种精细语义短语。在我们的基准测试下，我们评估了15个语言模型在分类、提取和解释任务中的性能，涵盖不同的模型架构和参数规模。通过实验，我们首次验证了缩放定律，并发现大型模型在大部分任务中表现优异，胜过较小的模型。其次，我们进一步研究了缩放语义关系分类，结果显示少样本的语言模型在任务中仍落后于普通微调模型。第三，通过人工评估，我们发现强大模型在语义短语处理方面的表现可以与人类水平匹敌。我们的基准测试结果可为未来的研究提供帮助，旨在提升语言模型在语义短语理解上的通用能力。我们的源代码和数据可在 https://github.com/jacklanda/LexBench 获取。

data.text: We introduce LexBench, a comprehensive evaluation suite enabled to test language models (LMs) on ten semantic phrase processing tasks. Unlike prior studies, it is the first work to propose a framework from the comparative perspective to model the general semantic phrase (i.e., lexical collocation) and three fine-grained semantic phrases, including idiomatic expression, noun compound, and verbal construction. Thanks to ourbenchmark, we assess the performance of 15 LMs across model architectures and parameter scales in classification, extraction, and interpretation tasks. Through the experiments, we first validate the scaling law and find that, as expected, large models excel better than the smaller ones in most tasks. Second, we investigate further through the scaling semantic relation categorization and find that few-shot LMs still lag behind vanilla fine-tuned models in the task. Third, through human evaluation, we find that the performance of strong models is comparable to the human level regarding semantic phrase processing. Our benchmarking findings can serve future research aiming to improve the generic capability of LMs on semantic phrase comprehension. Our source code and data are available at https://github.com/jacklanda/LexBench
data.translation: 我们介绍了LexBench评测环境，可以对语言模型(LM)在十个语义表达任务中进行全面测试。与之前的研究不同，这是首次从比较的角度提出框架，旨在模拟泛语义表达（即词组合）和三种精细语义表达，包括成语、名词复合和动词结构，并在不同架构和参数范围内对15种LM进行测试，包括分类、提取和解释任务。通过我们的评测，我们首先验证了比例关系定律，发现大型模型在大多数任务中的表现优于小型模型，这与预期一致。其次，我们进一步通过比例关系定律进行了深度探究，发现强大模型在语义表达识别任务中的表现虽然与人类水平相当，但是弱模型仍然表现较差。最后，我们通过人工评估发现，强大模型在语义表达理解任务中的表现与人类水平相当。我们的评测结果将为未来研究，旨在提升LM在语义表达理解任务中的普适能力，提供有价值的参考。我们的源代码和数据可在https://github.com/jacklanda/LexBench下载。

data.translation: 我们介绍了一个名为LexBench的全面评估平台，这是一个可以测试语言模型（LMs）在10种语义句子处理任务中的表现的完整评估平台。它不同于以往的研究，是首个从比较的角度提出一个框架，用于模拟普通语义句子（即语言组合）以及三类细微语义句子（包括术语表达、名词组和语法构造）的表现的整体性评估。我们的评估平台通过对15种模型在分类、提取和解释任务中的表现进行测试，首次验证了模型的尺度化关系规律。我们的评估结果表明，大型模型在大多数任务中表现更好，这与我们的预期一致。其次，我们通过进一步的评估和研究发现，训练过的模型和几个样本的训练模型在语义句子分类任务中的表现仍然落后于基于语义的模型，而在语义句子提取任务中，两者的表现几乎一致。最后，我们通过人工评估发现，强大的模型在语义句子处理能力上与人类相当。我们的评估结果为以后研究的目的，即提高语言模型在语义句子处理方面的普适性，提供了参考。我们的源码和数据都可以在https://github.com/jacklanda/LexBench上找到。

data.text: I’d never pureed a pizza before, so we cut the hot pizza into pieces, threw it into a two gallon container, poured in some water and let her rip. It took a little more water than we expected, but eventually we turned it into a smooth puree. Not wanting to disappoint my guest, I gave it a taste, added a little more pizza sauce, and a pinch of salt, and declared it to be a perfect pureed pizza. After a quick trip in the microwave, it had gotten cold from the water and pureeing, we sent it out to the guest who was insanely happy. We were told that they had been craving pizza for years since no one was willing to puree one for them.

data.translation: 我以前从未尝试过将披萨做成泥状，所以我们把热披萨切成片，扔进一个两加仑的容器里，加入一些水，然后让它搅拌起来。我们用的水比预期的要多一些，但最终我们还是将其搅拌成了顺滑的泥状。为了不让客人失望，我尝了一下，又加了一些披萨酱和一点盐，宣布它成为完美的泥状披萨。经过微波炉简短加热后，由于之前加水和搅拌，披萨已经变凉了，我们便将它送给了客人，客人高兴得不得了。我们被告知，他们多年来一直渴望吃披萨，因为没有人愿意为他们将披萨做成泥状。

data.text: Sampling-based motion planning (SBMP) algorithms are renowned for their robust global search capabilities. However, the inherent randomness in their sampling mechanisms often result in inconsistent path quality and limited search efficiency. In response to these challenges, this work proposes a novel deep learning-based motion planning framework, named Transformer-Enhanced Motion Planner (TEMP), which synergizes an Environmental Information Semantic Encoder (EISE) with a Motion Planning Transformer (MPT). EISE converts environmental data into semantic environmental information (SEI), providing MPT with an enriched environmental comprehension. MPT leverages an attention mechanism to dynamically recalibrate its focus on SEI, task objectives, and historical planning data, refining the sampling node generation. To demonstrate the capabilities of TEMP, we train our model using a dataset comprised of planning results produced by the RRT*. EISE and MPT are collaboratively trained, enabling EISE to autonomously learn and extract patterns from environmental data, thereby forming semantic representations that MPT could more effectively interpret and utilize for motion planning. Subsequently, we conducted a systematic evaluation of TEMP's efficacy across diverse task dimensions, which demonstrates that TEMP achieves exceptional performance metrics and a heightened degree of generalizability compared to state-of-the-art SBMPs.

data.text: Due to its military victories, policies, call for national self-determination and constructive Tamil nationalist platform, the LTTE was supported by major sections of the Tamil community. Based on the survey of the Jaffna population by the BBC and Reuters journalists, a U.S. diplomatic cable from 1994 stated that support for the LTTE was fairly strong among the Jaffna population who admired the discipline of the LTTE's administrative service, and that majority of Jaffna residents would choose the LTTE over the Sri Lankan Army given the choice. According to the assessments by independent observers, the LTTE administration of justice gained "significant social acceptance", and its courts were broadly seen as "more efficient, less expensive, and less vulnerable to corruption than their Sri Lankan counterparts." The LTTE police force also had "a high degree of legitimacy" among Tamil civilians who viewed it as "an uncorrupt and important stabilizing factor in the region." A survey carried out by the Centre for Policy Alternatives in 2002 from a sample of 89 Sri Lankan Tamils found that 89% regarded the LTTE as their sole representatives.
data.translation: 由于其军事胜利、政策、呼吁国家自决和建设性的泰米尔民族主义立场，LTTE 得到了泰米尔社区的主要部分的支持。根据 BBC 和路透社记者对贾夫纳人口的调查，1994 年一份美国外交电报指出，在贾夫纳人口中，支持 LTTE 的力量相当强大，他们钦佩 LTTE 行政服务的纪律，大多数贾夫纳居民在可选择的情况下会选择 LTTE 而不是斯里兰卡军队。根据独立观察员的评估，LTTE 司法管理得到了“明显的社会认可”，其法院被普遍视为“比斯里兰卡同行更高效、成本更低、不容易受腐败影响”。LTTE 警察部队在泰米尔平民中也享有“很高的合法性”，他们将 LTTE 视为“该地区一个不腐败且具有重要稳定作用的因素”。2002 年，由观点交流中心对 89 名斯里兰卡泰米尔人进行的调查发现，89% 的人认为 LTTE 是他们唯一的代表。

Based on the survey of the Jaffna population by the BBC and Reuters journalists, a U.S. diplomatic cable from 1994 stated that support for the LTTE was fairly strong among the Jaffna population who admired the discipline of the LTTE's administrative service, and that majority of Jaffna residents would choose the LTTE over the Sri Lankan Army given the choice. data.translation: 由于其在军事上取得的胜利、采取的政策和对各族群的呼吁，以及倡导实现民族自决的诉求，泰米尔裔激进组织“泰米尔之声”(LTTE)在泰米尔族群中广受支持。据英国广播公司和路透社记者对雅尔萨地区人口进行的调查显示，在雅尔萨地区，支持该组织的人数较多，而且他们崇拜该组织的行政部门所具备的严谨精神。如果有选择权，大多数雅尔萨地区居民会选择这一组织而非斯里兰卡军队。根据独立观察人士的评估，该组织在司法方面所采取的措施在泰米尔族群中得到了“显著的社会认可”，该组织的法庭也被广泛认为是“效率更高、成本更低、腐败程度更低的选择”。该组织的警察部门在泰米尔族群中的“合法性”也很高，泰米尔族群民众普遍认为这一部门是“不受腐败侵蚀的，并对该地区的稳定起着重要作用”。一项2002年由斯里兰卡中心政策选择研究所进行的调查显示，在调查样本中的89名斯里兰卡泰米尔族民众中，有89%人认为该组织是他们的唯一代表。

data.text: From June 30 to July 2, 2010, Monterrey was hit by the worst natural disaster in the city's history when Hurricane Alex delivered more than of rain in 72 hours, with areas reaching up to of rain during that same period, destroying homes, avenues, highways and infrastructure, and leaving up to 200,000 families without water for a week or more. The amount of water that fell was equivalent to the average precipitation for a year. This was about 3–4 times as much rain as Hurricane Gilbert produced in the city on September 15, 1988. The death toll of Hurricane Alex was estimated to be around 20.
data.translation: 从2010年6月30日至7月2日，蒙特雷市历经了其史上最严重的自然灾害。在这72小时内，飓风亚历克斯带来的降雨量超过了该市一年的平均降雨量，部分地区的降水量甚至达到了同期峰值，造成了房屋、街道、高速公路及基础设施的严重破坏，多达20万家庭一周以上时间断水。这场降雨量是1988年9月15日飓风吉尔伯特侵袭时的3至4倍。飓风亚历克斯造成的死亡人数估计约为20人。

value.text: 向我学习，亲爱的读者。

data.text: Learn from me, dear reader. Just because your parents may not have a need for speed doesn’t mean they won’t want the better version of the latest iPhone. My mom waited patiently to upgrade from her iPhone 8 Plus, and this year found she truly needed to. After a short conversation, I (incorrectly) steered her in the direction of the basic iPhone 15. During her first weekend with said phone, I immediately found out what I hadn’t thought of. The iPhone 15 only gives you native 0.5x and 2x zoom options, leaving out the 3x and 5x options found in the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. So, if your mom’s due for an upgrade, have a good conversation up front about the photos she takes and how far she takes them from her subjects. My mom’s love of a good landscape photo deserves a better zoom, and I look forward to fixing that down the line. — Henry T. Casey, electronics writer
data.translation: 向我学习，亲爱的读者。仅仅因为你的父母可能不追求速度，并不意味着他们不想要最新款iPhone的更好版本。我妈妈耐心地等待从她的iPhone 8 Plus升级，而今年她发现确实需要升级了。经过一番简短的交谈，我（错误地）引导她选择了基础款的iPhone 15。在她开始使用这部手机的第一个周末，我立刻发现了我之前没想到的问题。iPhone 15只提供原生的0.5倍和2倍变焦选项，而没有iPhone 15 Pro和iPhone 15 Pro Max中的3倍和5倍变焦选项。所以，如果你的妈妈需要升级手机，一开始就应该好好讨论一下她拍摄的照片以及她与拍摄对象的距离。我妈妈热爱拍优美风景照，她值得拥有更好的变焦功能，我期待将来能解决这个问题。 — Henry T. Casey, 电子产品作家

value.text: 抗议者们认为以色列军队在加沙的行动是对巴勒斯坦人权利、土地和文化长期残酷压迫的一种继续。

data.text: Students inside campus encampments that have spread across the United States over the past week are from a variety of backgrounds — including Palestinians, Arabs, Jews and Muslims, joined by students of other religious and ethnic backgrounds. They hold a spectrum of political and social views too: liberal and heterodox, progressive and absolutist. Many have been motivated by the reports and video coming out of Gaza that is often unbearable to watch. Many of these students see the actions of the Israeli military in Gaza as a continuation of a more than 70-year-long oppression of Palestinian rights, land and culture. Protesters say they want their schools to stand against what they believe is genocide in Gaza.

data.text: Schumacher never won a race and never finished higher than eighth in the overall Formula One standings during his comeback, placing 13th in the 2012 Drivers' Championship, and closed his career with 91 wins,155 podiums, and 68 pole positions, which at the time were all records. Before it was surpassed by Hamilton in 2020, Schumacher's 91 wins were one short of the combined win totals of Ayrton Senna and Alain Prost; as of 2019, only 81 drivers in the history of the Formula One World Championship had started more races than he won. Although Schumacher did not win any race or title at Mercedes GP, which then went on to win a record-breaking (of Schumacher's Ferrari from 1999 to 2004) eight Constructors' Championships under Hamilton, Rosberg, and Valtteri Bottas from 2014 to , Ross Brawn said that "Michael's contribution to our development and the future of our team has been significant", and observed: "In my opinion, he is the greatest Formula One driver, and the records which he holds in our sport speak volumes for his success and commitment."
data.translation: 舒马赫在复出期间从未赢得过一场比赛，也从未在积分榜上取得过排名靠前于第八的成绩，在2012年的车手总冠军排行榜上排名第13，而他的职业生涯也就此落幕，他在职业生涯中共赢得了91场比赛，并在95次的前三名中坐拥155席，其中还包括68场冠军头衔，这一成绩曾是一项纪录，但是在2020年，汉密尔顿打破了这一记录，舒马赫的91场胜利只有塞恩斯和普罗斯蒂的总胜场数（265场）少了一场，至2019年，只有81位车手在职业生涯中参加过更多的比赛，而在梅赛德斯车队，舒马赫从未赢得过任何比赛或冠军，但是他在该队的发展和未来都发挥了重要作用，罗斯·布朗说：“舒马赫对我们的发展和未来做出了巨大贡献”，并补充说：“我认为，舒马赫是最伟大的赛车手之一，他的成就和奉献精神都说明了这一点”。

data.text: Schumacher never won a race and never finished higher than eighth in the overall Formula One standings during his comeback, placing 13th in the 2012 Drivers' Championship, and closed his career with 91 wins,155 podiums, and 68 pole positions, which at the time were all records. Although Schumacher did not win any race or title at Mercedes GP, which then went on to win a record-breaking (of Schumacher's Ferrari from 1999 to 2004) eight Constructors' Championships under Hamilton, Rosberg, and Valtteri Bottas from 2014 to , Ross Brawn said that "Michael's contribution to our development and the future of our team has been significant", and observed: "In my opinion, he is the greatest Formula One driver, and the records which he holds in our sport speak volumes for his success and commitment."
data.translation: 舒马赫在他的复出期间从未赢得过一场比赛，也从未在整体一级方程式积分榜上排名高于第八，2012年车手冠军赛中排名第13。他的职业生涯中共获得91次胜利、155次领奖台和68次夺得杆位，这些都曾是创纪录的。直到2020年被汉密尔顿超越前，舒马赫的91场胜利比阿耐顿·塞纳和阿兰·普罗斯特的总胜利次数多一场；直至2019年结束时，历届一级方程式世界锦标赛中，只有81名车手在这些比赛历史中获得更多的起跑次数。虽然舒马赫在梅赛德斯车队并未赢得过任何一场比赛或冠军，但梅赛德斯随后却在2014年以来通过汉密尔顿、罗斯伯格和瓦尔特利·博塔斯，赢得了创纪录的八次车队冠军（超过舒马赫 1999 年至 2004 年在法拉利的纪录）。罗斯·布朗表示：“迈克尔对我们的发展和团队未来的贡献是重大的”，并观察到：“在我看来，他是最伟大的一级方程式车手，他在我们的运动中创造的这些记录充分证明了他的成功和奉献。”

value.text: 在我们这项运动中他创造的纪录充分展现了他的成功和专注。”

data.text: Schumacher never won a race and never finished higher than eighth in the overall Formula One standings during his comeback, placing 13th in the 2012 Drivers' Championship, and closed his career with 91 wins,155 podiums, and 68 pole positions, which at the time were all records. Before it was surpassed by Hamilton in 2020, Schumacher's 91 wins were one short of the combined win totals of Ayrton Senna and Alain Prost; as of 2019, only 81 drivers in the history of the Formula One World Championship had started more races than he won. Although Schumacher did not win any race or title at Mercedes GP, which then went on to win a record-breaking (of Schumacher's Ferrari from 1999 to 2004) eight Constructors' Championships under Hamilton, Rosberg, and Valtteri Bottas from 2014 to , Ross Brawn said that "Michael's contribution to our development and the future of our team has been significant", and observed: "In my opinion, he is the greatest Formula One driver, and the records which he holds in our sport speak volumes for his success and commitment."
data.translation: 舒马赫在他的复出生涯中从未赢得过一场比赛，也未曾在整个一级方程式赛季中排名高于第八名；他在2012年的车手冠军赛中名列第13位，最终以91次胜利、155次登上领奖台以及68次夺得杆位结束了职业生涯，当时这些成就都是纪录。直到2020年哈密尔顿超越他，舒马赫的91次胜利比阿雷顿·塞纳和阿兰·普罗斯特的总胜利次数少一场；截至2019年，仅有81位车手在一级方程式世界锦标赛历史上的出赛次数超过他的胜利次数。尽管舒马赫没有在梅赛德斯车队赢得过比赛或冠军，但在2014年至今，汉密尔顿、罗斯伯格和瓦尔特利·博塔斯带领下的梅赛德斯车队创下了多项纪录（超越了舒马赫于1999年至2004年法拉利获得的8个车队冠军）。罗斯·布朗表示：“迈克尔对我们团队的发展和未来做出了重大贡献”，并称：“在我看来，他是最伟大的一级方程式车手，在我们这项运动中他创造的纪录充分展现了他的成功和专注。”

data.text: Parachute’s high-quality linens collection just got a new addition with the launch of the Organic Gauze Terry Bath collection, which weaves together organic cotton and linen for a dual-sided experience. The super-soft Cloud Cotton Gauze is on the front, and there’s a plush terry on the back for maximum absorption once you step out of the bath.  The Organic Gauze Terry Robe has an elegant, longer silhouette topped off by a shawl collar and sells for $129. It’s available in sizes XS through 3X in Cream and Moss colors. If you want to go for the full spa experience, you can also pick up the double-sided Organic Terry Gauze Towels, which are $29 for the hand towel and $49 for the bath towel.

data.text: Meanwhile, the Apple Watch Ultra 2 is constructed out of titanium, giving it greater durability and a much bulkier appearance (while staying nice and light). It’s a much bolder look than the Series 9, but it’s easy to get used to. Of course, it only comes in a single case size — 49mm — which might be too big for some wrists. I’ve compared it a lot to my 45mm Series 8 in anticipation of ordering an Ultra for myself, and it’s not all that much bigger, save for the buttons that stick out a bit more due to their enclosure. Oh, and in case you were wondering, any band for the 45mm Apple Watch will fit on the Ultra 2.
data.translation: 与此同时，Apple Watch Ultra 2 采用钛金属打造，具有更高的耐用性和更加庞大的外观（同时保持轻巧）。相比 Series 9，它看起来更加大胆，但很容易适应。当然，它只有一个机身尺寸 - 49mm，这对于一些手腕来说可能太大了。我已经将其与我的 45mm Series 8 进行了很多比较，期待着为自己订购一个 Ultra，它比 45mm Series 8 大不了多少，只是因为按钮稍微突出一些而更加醒目。噢，顺便提一下，你如果在担心，任何适用于 45mm Apple Watch 的表带都可以配戴在 Ultra 2 上。

data.text: Multimodal machine translation (MMT) is a challenging task that seeks to improve translation quality by incorporating visual information. However, recent studies have indicated that the visual information provided by existing MMT datasets is insufficient, causing models to disregard it and overestimate their capabilities. This issue presents a significant obstacle to the development of MMT research. This paper presents a novel solution to this issue by introducing 3AM, an ambiguity-aware MMT dataset comprising 26,000 parallel sentence pairs in English and Chinese, each with corresponding images. Our dataset is specifically designed to include more ambiguity and a greater variety of both captions and images than other MMT datasets. We utilize a word sense disambiguation model to select ambiguous data from vision-and-language datasets, resulting in a more challenging dataset. We further benchmark several state-of-the-art MMT models on our proposed dataset. Experimental results show that MMT models trained on our dataset exhibit a greater ability to exploit visual information than those trained on other MMT datasets. Our work provides a valuable resource for researchers in the field of multimodal learning and encourages further exploration in this area. The data, code and scripts are freely available at https://github.com/MaxyLee/3AM.
data.translation: 多模态机器翻译（MMT）是一个充满挑战的任务，其目标是通过融合视觉信息来提升翻译质量。然而，最近的研究显示，现有的MMT数据集中的视觉信息不足，导致模型忽略此信息，并对自身的性能评估过高。这一问题严重阻碍了MMT研究的进展。本文提出一种创新的解决方案，推出了一个名为3AM的新型MMT数据集，该数据集包含26,000个带有相应图像的中英文句对，并特别设计以增加歧义性和图文标题的多样性。我们使用词义消歧模型从视觉语言数据集中挑选模糊数据，使得该数据集更具挑战性。此外，我们还在该数据集上测试了几种最新的MMT模型。实验结果表明，相较于其他数据集，使用我们的数据集训练出的MMT模型能更有效地利用视觉信息。我们的研究为多模态学习领域的研究者提供了一个宝贵资源，并鼓励大家在该领域进行更深入的探讨。相关的数据、代码和脚本可以通过 https://github.com/MaxyLee/3AM 免费访问。

value.text: 在我们的数据集上训练的MMT模型在利用视觉信息方面比在其他MMT数据集上训练的模型表现更出色。

We utilize a word sense disambiguation model to select ambiguous data from vision-and-language datasets, resulting in a more challenging dataset. We further benchmark several state-of-the-art MMT models on our proposed dataset. Experimental results show that MMT models trained on our dataset exhibit a greater ability to exploit visual information than those trained on other MMT datasets. Our work provides a valuable resource for researchers in the field of multimodal learning and encourages further exploration in this area. The data, code and scripts are freely available at https://github.com/MaxyLee/3AM.

data.text: Multimodal machine translation (MMT) is a challenging task that seeks to improve translation quality by incorporating visual information. However, recent studies have indicated that the visual information provided by existing MMT datasets is insufficient, causing models to disregard it and overestimate their capabilities. This issue presents a significant obstacle to the development of MMT research. This paper presents a novel solution to this issue by introducing 3AM, an ambiguity-aware MMT dataset comprising 26,000 parallel sentence pairs in English and Chinese, each with corresponding images. Our dataset is specifically designed to include more ambiguity and a greater variety of both captions and images than other MMT datasets. We utilize a word sense disambiguation model to select ambiguous data from vision-and-language datasets, resulting in a more challenging dataset. We further benchmark several state-of-the-art MMT models on our proposed dataset. Experimental results show that MMT models trained on our dataset exhibit a greater ability to exploit visual information than those trained on other MMT datasets. Our work provides a valuable resource for researchers in the field of multimodal learning and encourages further exploration in this area. The data, code and scripts are freely available at https://github.com/MaxyLee/3AM.

value.text: 但由于运动扩散模型的多步采样机制需要进行数百次或者数千次的运动潜函数评估，导致其实时推断困难。

data.text: Motion diffusion models have recently proven successful for text-driven human motion generation. Despite their excellent generation performance, they are challenging to infer in real time due to the multi-step sampling mechanism that involves tens or hundreds of repeat function evaluation iterations. To this end, we investigate a motion latent consistency Training (MLCT) for motion generation to alleviate the computation and time consumption during iteration inference. It applies diffusion pipelines to low-dimensional motion latent spaces to mitigate the computational burden of each function evaluation. Explaining the diffusion process with probabilistic flow ordinary differential equation (PF-ODE) theory, the MLCT allows extremely few steps infer between the prior distribution to the motion latent representation distribution via maintaining consistency of the outputs over the trajectory of PF-ODE. Especially, we introduce a quantization constraint to optimize motion latent representations that are bounded, regular, and well-reconstructed compared to traditional variational constraints. Furthermore, we propose a conditional PF-ODE trajectory simulation method, which improves the conditional generation performance with minimal additional training costs. Extensive experiments on two human motion generation benchmarks show that the proposed model achieves state-of-the-art performance with less than 10% time cost.
data.translation: 近年来，基于文本驱动的人体动作生成方法在运动扩散模型的帮助下取得了显著进展。尽管其生成效果优异，但由于运动扩散模型的多步采样机制需要进行数百次或者数千次的运动潜函数评估，导致其实时推断困难。为了缓解这一问题，我们提出了一种基于运动潜函数协议的运动潜函数培训（MLCT）方法，它采用流变学理论解释了运动扩散的过程，并利用流变学的多维运动潜函数空间进行扩散，以减少每次函数评估所需的计算量。该方法通过维持扩散过程中输出的连续性，使得在迭代推断中，从先验分布到运动潜函数表示分布的迭代过程需要很少的步骤。尤其是，我们引入了量化约束，对运动潜函数表示进行优化，以使其更加稳定、可靠且能够很好地重建。此外，我们还提出了基于条件流变学普通微分方程（PF-ODE）理论的条件扩散流程模拟方法，以提高条件生成性能并降低训练成本。实验结果表明，该模型在两个人体动作生成数据集上取得了最佳性能，且计算成本仅为原有模型的10%。

data.text: Motion diffusion models have recently proven successful for text-driven human motion generation. Despite their excellent generation performance, they are challenging to infer in real time due to the multi-step sampling mechanism that involves tens or hundreds of repeat function evaluation iterations. To this end, we investigate a motion latent consistency Training (MLCT) for motion generation to alleviate the computation and time consumption during iteration inference. It applies diffusion pipelines to low-dimensional motion latent spaces to mitigate the computational burden of each function evaluation. Explaining the diffusion process with probabilistic flow ordinary differential equation (PF-ODE) theory, the MLCT allows extremely few steps infer between the prior distribution to the motion latent representation distribution via maintaining consistency of the outputs over the trajectory of PF-ODE. Especially, we introduce a quantization constraint to optimize motion latent representations that are bounded, regular, and well-reconstructed compared to traditional variational constraints. Furthermore, we propose a conditional PF-ODE trajectory simulation method, which improves the conditional generation performance with minimal additional training costs. Extensive experiments on two human motion generation benchmarks show that the proposed model achieves state-of-the-art performance with less than 10% time cost.
data.translation: 运动扩散模型最近已经被证明对于基于文本驱动的人体运动生成非常成功。尽管它们具有出色的生成性能，但由于涉及数十甚至数百次重复函数评估迭代的多步抽样机制，因此在实时推断方面具有挑战性。为此，我们研究了一种运动潜在一致性训练（MLCT）用于减轻迭代推断中的计算和时间消耗。它应用扩散管道到低维度运动潜在空间，以减轻每个函数评估的计算负担。通过用概率流普通微分方程（PF-ODE）理论解释扩散过程，MLCT允许极少的步骤在先验分布和运动潜在表征分布之间推断，通过维持PF-ODE轨迹上的输出一致性。特别地，我们引入了量化约束来优化边界、规则和良好重构的运动潜在表征，与传统变分约束相比。此外，我们提出了一种条件PF-ODE轨迹模拟方法，通过最小的额外训练成本改善条件生成性能。对两个人体运动生成基准进行了广泛实验，结果显示该模型以不到10%的时间成本实现了最先进的性能。

data.translation: 在最近的研究中，动态模糊模型已经证明可以有效地用于人类动作的文本驱动动作生成。虽然这种模型在动作生成性能上表现出了极高的效率，但是其在实际情况下进行推理的计算量和时间成本却十分昂贵。为此，我们研究了一种动态模糊模型的快速推理方法，即动态模糊模型的质量保持域训练 (MLCT) 。它利用了各种数值流差分方程的理论，用来降低每次函数评估所需的计算量。该模型以具有高度一致性的输出为目标，通过维持质量保持域中的输出轨迹的一致性，从而减少了传统的概率流差分方程的训练成本。为了进一步改善模型的推理性能，我们还提出了一种细化的概率流差分方程的训练方法，该方法可以有效地将模型的输出限制在合理的范围内，而这种限制比传统的概率流差分方程的训练要具有更好的效率。此外，我们还提出了一种快速模拟方法，用来改善模型的产生性能，这种方法的训练成本较低，且能够大大提高模型的生成性能。通过对两个人类动作生成的测试数据集进行测试，我们证明了这种模型的性能达到了最佳水平。在时间成本方面，该模型的性能仅仅增加了不到10％。

data.text: Another open-ear option, Anker Soundcore AeroFit Pro Open-Ear Headphones use a highly directional speaker to optimize sound quality, essentially reflecting more sound waves toward your ears. These are a little bulkier and a little more precarious during high-intensity runs, with the speaker, which sits near your ear canal, counterbalanced by the battery compartment, which sits behind your ear. (They come with a detachable 0.7-millimeter titanium wire neckband that clips on to each headphone, anchoring them in place). The larger speaker definitely offers a more immersive sound experience, though, with sound effects like spatial audio and sound field modes. The best part: The headphones last 14 hours on a single charge, and 10 minutes of fast-charging gives you a 5.5-hour boost.
data.translation: 另一种开放式耳机选择，Anker Soundcore AeroFit Pro 开放式耳机采用高度定向扬声器来优化音质，本质上向您的耳朵反射更多声波。这些耳机稍微笨重一些，在高强度跑步时也稍显不稳固，扬声器靠近耳道，通过电池仓的平衡，位于耳后。它们配有一个可拆卸的0.7毫米钛合金线颈带，可以夹在每个耳机上，使它们固定在适当位置（颈带有助于将耳机锚定）。较大的扬声器确实提供了更沉浸的音效体验，具有空间音频和声场模式的声效。最好的部分：耳机单次充电可持续使用14小时，快速充电10分钟即可获得5.5小时的使用提升。

value.text: 老曼对自己的表演并不觉得特别不满意

data.text: Oldman didn’t hate his performance, necessarily, but he felt it “wasn’t as good as it could have been” had he put more effort. He then mentioned how his late co-star, Alan Rickman (Snape) read all the books before playing his character. It gave him a better sense of who he was meant to be, and allowed for a more iconic role. Oldman said he didn’t quite have the time as he took the part of Sirius at a time in his life when he was a single dad to his three sons. As he loved the franchise and being a part of it, he was a bit disappointed in himself for not reading the source material in full.

data.text: The reason I’m telling you all of this is to try and illustrate what families who are food insufficient go through. Please consider giving food you would actually eat. I know beggars can’t be choosers but we could really use something good to happen once in a while. That fresh coffee in your cupboard would make someone’s freaking week. All I ask is that you try to imagine what it would be like to be in our shoes. But we’ll definitely keep taking those expired Slim Jim’s without hesitation, though.
